text: The men's 182 + 364 + 546 + 728 medley relay event at the 1968 European Indoor Games was held on 10 March in Madrid. The first athlete ran one lap of the 182-metre track, the second two, the third three and the anchor four, thus 10 laps or 1820 metres in total. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !Rank !Nation !Competitors !Time !Notes |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Aleksandr Lebedev Boris Savchuk Igor Potapchenko Sergey Kryuchok || 3:52.2 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Marian Dudziak Waldemar Korycki Andrzej Badeński Edmund Borowski || 3:54.6 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|José Luis Sánchez Paraíso Ramon Magarinos Alfonso Gabernet José María Reina || 4:02.8 || |- | ||align=left| ||align=left|Petr Utekal Ladislav Kříž Pavel Hruška Jan Kasal || || |} ==References== Category:4 × 400 metres relay at the European Athletics Indoor Championships Relay
title: 1968 European Indoor Games – Men's medley relay
